targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  now() as time_sec,
  c.country_name as metric,
  COUNT(u.user_id) as value
FROM user u
inner join country c on u.user_country_id=c.country_id 
where c.country_is_manager=0 and c.country_name is not null and u.user_loggedoff=0 and u.user_name is not null
  and u.user_lastupdate >
    -- timestamp of today at 00.00
    UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW(6)) - TIME_TO_SEC(
      TIMEDIFF(
        TIME(NOW()),'00:00:00'
      )
    )
group by c.country_name

SELECT
  now() as time_sec,
  plan_state as metric,
  COUNT(plan_id) as value
FROM plan p
inner join country c on c.country_id = p.plan_country_id
where c.country_name IN ($Team) and p.plan_state != 'DELETED'
GROUP by plan_state

select
c.country_name as Country,
CONCAT(p.plan_name, ' farm #',g.geometry_id) as Farm,
eo.energy_output_maxcapacity/1000000000 as 'Max capacity GW',
IFNULL(SUM(eo2.energy_output_maxcapacity),0)/1000000000 as 'Cables GW',
SUM(IF(JSON_CONTAINS_PATH(g2.geometry_data, 'one', '$.NumberCables'),JSON_EXTRACT(g2.geometry_data, '$.NumberCables')+0,0)) as 'Number of cables',
CONCAT(GROUP_CONCAT((eo2.energy_output_maxcapacity/1000000000) SEPARATOR ' + ')) as 'Cable GW distribution'
from geometry g
inner join layer l on l.layer_id=g.geometry_layer_id and l.layer_original_id is NOT NULL
inner join layer ol on l.layer_original_id=ol.layer_id AND ol.layer_editing_type='sourcepolygon'
inner join plan_layer pl on pl.plan_layer_layer_id=l.layer_id
inner join plan p on p.plan_id=pl.plan_layer_plan_id and p.plan_state != 'DELETED'
inner join country c on c.country_id=p.plan_country_id
inner join energy_output eo on g.geometry_id=eo.energy_output_geometry_id
left join energy_connection ec on ec.energy_connection_start_id=g.geometry_id OR ec.energy_connection_end_id=g.geometry_id
left join geometry g2 on g2.geometry_id=ec.energy_connection_cable_id and g2.geometry_active=1
left join energy_output eo2 on eo2.energy_output_geometry_id=g2.geometry_id
where c.country_name IN ($Team) AND g.geometry_active=1
group by g.geometry_id
order by FIELD(p.plan_state,'DESIGN','CONSULTATION','APPROVAL','APPROVED','IMPLEMENTED'), p.plan_id DESC

SELECT
  count(g.geometry_id)
from geometry g
inner join layer l on l.layer_id=g.geometry_layer_id and l.layer_original_id is NOT NULL
inner join layer ol on l.layer_original_id=ol.layer_id AND ol.layer_editing_type='sourcepolygon'
inner join plan_layer pl on pl.plan_layer_layer_id=l.layer_id
inner join plan p on p.plan_id=pl.plan_layer_plan_id and p.plan_state != 'DELETED'
inner join country c on c.country_id=p.plan_country_id
where c.country_name IN ($Team) and g.geometry_active=1

SELECT
  IFNULL(sum(eo.energy_output_maxcapacity),0)/1000000000
from energy_output eo
inner join geometry g on g.geometry_id=eo.energy_output_geometry_id
inner join layer l on l.layer_id=g.geometry_layer_id and l.layer_original_id is NOT NULL
inner join layer ol on l.layer_original_id=ol.layer_id AND ol.layer_editing_type='sourcepolygon'
inner join plan_layer pl on pl.plan_layer_layer_id=l.layer_id
inner join plan p on p.plan_id=pl.plan_layer_plan_id and p.plan_state NOT IN('DELETED', 'ARCHIVED')
inner join country c on c.country_id=p.plan_country_id
where c.country_name IN ($Team)

select CONCAT(c.country_name, ':', u.user_name, ' (', u.user_id ,')')  as name
from user u
inner join country c on c.country_id=u.user_country_id
where c.country_is_manager=0 and c.country_name is not null and u.user_loggedoff=0 and u.user_name is not null
  and u.user_lastupdate >
    -- timestamp of today at 00.00
    UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW(6)) - TIME_TO_SEC(
      TIMEDIFF(
        TIME(NOW()),'00:00:00'
      )
    )
  and c.country_name IN ($Team)
group by u.user_id
order by u.user_id DESC

SELECT
  IFNULL(SUM(eo2.energy_output_maxcapacity),0)/1000000000
from geometry g
inner join layer l on l.layer_id=g.geometry_layer_id and l.layer_original_id is NOT NULL
inner join layer ol on l.layer_original_id=ol.layer_id AND ol.layer_editing_type='sourcepolygon'
inner join plan_layer pl on pl.plan_layer_layer_id=l.layer_id
inner join plan p on p.plan_id=pl.plan_layer_plan_id and p.plan_state NOT IN ('DELETED', 'ARCHIVED')
inner join country c on c.country_id=p.plan_country_id
inner join energy_output eo on g.geometry_id=eo.energy_output_geometry_id
left join energy_connection ec on ec.energy_connection_start_id=g.geometry_id OR ec.energy_connection_end_id=g.geometry_id
left join geometry g2 on g2.geometry_id=ec.energy_connection_cable_id and g2.geometry_active=1
left join energy_output eo2 on eo2.energy_output_geometry_id=g2.geometry_id
where c.country_name IN ($Team) and g.geometry_active=1

select
  CONCAT(c.country_name, ':', IF(plan_name='',CONCAT('plan ', plan_id),plan_name)) as name,
  plan_state as state,
  TIMEDIFF(now(), plan_time) as lifetime
from plan p
inner join country c on c.country_id = p.plan_country_id
where plan_state IN ('DESIGN','CONSULTATION','APPROVAL') and TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, plan_time, now()) = 0 and c.country_name IN ($Team)
ORDER BY plan_time

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(i.max_gw)-SUM(least(i.max_gw,i.cables_gw)),0)/1000000000 as missing_gw
from
(
  SELECT
    eo.energy_output_maxcapacity as max_gw,IFNULL(SUM(eo2.energy_output_maxcapacity),0) as cables_gw
  from geometry g
  inner join layer l on l.layer_id=g.geometry_layer_id and l.layer_original_id is NOT NULL
  inner join layer ol on l.layer_original_id=ol.layer_id AND ol.layer_editing_type='sourcepolygon'
  inner join plan_layer pl on pl.plan_layer_layer_id=l.layer_id
  inner join plan p on p.plan_id=pl.plan_layer_plan_id and p.plan_state != 'DELETED'
  inner join country c on c.country_id=p.plan_country_id
  inner join energy_output eo on g.geometry_id=eo.energy_output_geometry_id
  left join energy_connection ec on ec.energy_connection_start_id=g.geometry_id OR ec.energy_connection_end_id=g.geometry_id
  left join geometry g2 on g2.geometry_id=ec.energy_connection_cable_id and G2.geometry_active=1
  left join energy_output eo2 on eo2.energy_output_geometry_id=g2.geometry_id
  where c.country_name IN ($Team) and g.geometry_active=1
  group by g.geometry_id
) as i

SELECT
  IFNULL(sum(eo.energy_output_capacity),0)/1000000000
from energy_output eo
inner join geometry g on g.geometry_id=eo.energy_output_geometry_id
inner join layer l on l.layer_id=g.geometry_layer_id and l.layer_original_id is NOT NULL
inner join layer ol on l.layer_original_id=ol.layer_id AND ol.layer_editing_type='sourcepolygon'
inner join plan_layer pl on pl.plan_layer_layer_id=l.layer_id
inner join plan p on p.plan_id=pl.plan_layer_plan_id and p.plan_state = 'IMPLEMENTED'
inner join country c on c.country_id=p.plan_country_id
where c.country_name IN ($Team)

SELECT
  -- how to detect starting year? hard-coded to 2018...
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(
    CONCAT(
      -- note that we merge setup month with first month
      2018+FLOOR(if(k.kpi_month=-1,0,k.kpi_month)/12),
      '-',
      (if(k.kpi_month=-1,0,k.kpi_month) % 12)+1,
      '-1 00:00:00'
    )
  ) as time,
  CONCAT(k.kpi_name,' | ', ks.starting_value) as metric,
  k.kpi_value-ks.starting_value as value
FROM kpi k
inner join
  (
    select kpi_name, kpi_country_id, kpi_value as starting_value from kpi
      where kpi_type='ECOLOGY' and kpi_month=-1
  ) ks on ks.kpi_name=k.kpi_name and ks.kpi_country_id=k.kpi_country_id
WHERE
  kpi_type='ECOLOGY'
-- note that we merge setup month with first month
group by k.kpi_name, k.kpi_country_id, IF(k.kpi_month=-1,0,k.kpi_month)
order by kpi_month

panels.title: Biomass change relative to starting value

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  count(w.warning_id)
 from warning w
inner join layer l on w.warning_layer_id=l.layer_id
inner join plan_layer pl on pl.plan_layer_layer_id=l.layer_id
inner join plan p on p.plan_id=pl.plan_layer_plan_id and p.plan_state != 'DELETED'
inner join country c on c.country_id=p.plan_country_id
where w.warning_active=1 and warning_issue_type='Error' and c.country_name IN ($Team)

select
  CONCAT(c.country_name, ':', IF(plan_name='',CONCAT('plan id: ', plan_id),plan_name)) as name,
  plan_state as state,
  TIMEDIFF(now(), plan_time) as lifetime
from plan p
inner join country c on c.country_id = p.plan_country_id
where plan_state IN ('DESIGN','CONSULTATION','APPROVAL') and TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, plan_time, now()) > 0 and c.country_name IN ($Team)
ORDER BY plan_time

SELECT
  -- how to detect starting year? hard-coded to 2018...
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(
    CONCAT(
      -- note that we merge setup month with first month
      2018+FLOOR(if(k.kpi_month=-1,0,k.kpi_month)/12),
      '-',
      (if(k.kpi_month=-1,0,k.kpi_month) % 12)+1,
      '-1 00:00:00'
    )
  ) as time,
  CONCAT(k.kpi_name,' | ', ks.starting_value) as metric,
  k.kpi_value-ks.starting_value as value
FROM kpi k
inner join
  (
    select kpi_name, kpi_country_id, kpi_value as starting_value from kpi
      where kpi_type='SHIPPING' and kpi_month=-1
  ) ks on ks.kpi_name=k.kpi_name and ks.kpi_country_id=k.kpi_country_id
inner join
  (
    select kpi_name, kpi_country_id, MAX(kpi_value) as max_value, MIN(kpi_value) as min_value from kpi
      where kpi_type='SHIPPING' group by kpi_name, kpi_country_id
  ) km on km.kpi_name=k.kpi_name and km.kpi_country_id=k.kpi_country_id
WHERE
  kpi_type='SHIPPING' and kpi_unit='%' and (ABS(ks.starting_value-km.max_value)>0.0001 or ABS(ks.starting_value-km.min_value)>0.0001) 
-- note that we merge setup month with first month
group by k.kpi_name, k.kpi_country_id, IF(k.kpi_month=-1,0,k.kpi_month)
order by kpi_month

panels.title: Shipping intensity change relative to starting value

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  now() as time_sec,
  r.restriction_message as metric,
  count(r.restriction_id) as value
from warning w
inner join layer l on w.warning_layer_id=l.layer_id
inner join plan_layer pl on pl.plan_layer_layer_id=l.layer_id
inner join plan p on p.plan_id=pl.plan_layer_plan_id and p.plan_state != 'DELETED'
inner join country c on c.country_id=p.plan_country_id
inner join restriction r on w.warning_restriction_id=r.restriction_id
where w.warning_active=1 and warning_issue_type='Error' and c.country_name IN ($Team)
group by r.restriction_message
order by value DESC

list.definition: select country_name from country where country_is_manager = 0
list.label: Country
list.name: Team
list.query: select country_name from country where country_is_manager = 0
